txt.en: You have been tasked with rescuing miners from the partially collapsed cave of Mesem-gairu.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have sent urgent word from the caverns of Mesem-gairu. While some miners were excavating, the caverns partially collapsed! These dwarves are expert miners. I believe that our enemies may have planned to collapse the caverns with our miners inside. Let us hope the miners have survived.

'You are to travel to Mesem-gairu at once. We must rescue the trapped miners!'
'Within the glittering caverns of Mesem-gairu lies a treasure trove of crystals, wanted by manyâ€¦.\n\n'Your mission is to rescue miners from the partially collapsed cave of Mesem-gairu.'
The objective must be completed before time runs out, or the mission will fail!
Your mission is to rescue miners from the partially collapsed cave of Mesem-gairu.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel.

'Well done!\n\n'I am glad that you were able to rescue the miners. It would seem that the miners agree with my theory as well. We must be more careful in Gundabad, for many foes still lurk in its shadows!'
